name: UnfoldU Learning App for Class KG to 12th
description: Our Mission  1)Our mission is to provide easy and accessible online study material for EVS, Mathematics, Science, Physics, Chemistry, Biology to students of classes - 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th, 8th, 9th, 10th, 11th & 12th for all boards of the country. The videos are available in both English & Hindi medium.  2)Through our study module, students can study anytime 24*7*365 at their home only. The time saved from going and coming back from study centers can be productively used for extra-curricular activities.  3)The problem of pick up and drop is solved and parents do not need to worry about their children getting caught in bad company.  Our Vision  1)Our company UnfoldU aims to revolutionize education & learning at all levels by changing the way it is practiced.  2)With our team of around 100 experts, we provide 24*7*365 excellent understandable study material by an interactive method to students with the minimized financial burden on parents.  3)The company has its offices in USA, Canada & India. With plans and work underway, in the coming years we would be expanding our operations in 9 other countries - Canada, USA, Australia, England (UK), Europe, New Zealand, Singapore, South Africa & Middle East.  4)We aim to provide worthwhile quality service as a responsible educational organization that recognizes the needs of all students. We aspire to provide relevant and high-quality study material for English, Computer, test preparation for competitive exams and language courses.
